website_summaries.verdict: These bags offer supreme durability, making them a go-to set to use game after game.
pros: Set of 8 bags comes with handy drawstring bag for convenient storage
These are regulation size and weight bags
Made of durable duck cloth, making them long lasting
These are professionally double stitched to work against tearing or rips
cons: Bag colors may fade after repeated exposure to the sun

customer_reviews.title: Very unhappy that they are not very durable.
customer_reviews.text: The seam let go on one of the bags and some of the beads came out. This was only the third time the bags had been used. Very unhappy that they are not very durable. The description says the bags are warrantied for one year. We have only had the bags for two months. Who can I contact about getting a replacement bag? UPDATE: The company honored their warranty. Not only did they replace the one failed bag, they send me five spare bags. In the meantime, I was able to use needle and thread to sew up the failed bag. It seems good as new (with a few lost beads).
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Tickle

customer_reviews.title: Unique and sad
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! Looks amazing with our new cornhole board! So amending my review...they still look amazing with the board I made...however...there is already a hole in one of the blue star bags. 😔 only played with a couple hours to find this. And we bought another set for our other board we made. We shall see if they hold up after today.
customer_reviews.author: Kreyn

customer_reviews.title: They are great for the price
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I built a corn hole game for our granddaughter. When I told her she had to make the bean bags, she asked if I could find them online. I did and got these. They are great for the price. They have small plastic pellets in them and have served well. One bag did rip during the first game, but after email the company, they replace it, with a few to spare. Good customer relations!
customer_reviews.author: lmprtodd

customer_reviews.title: An absolute hit for July 4th!
customer_reviews.text: We originally found similar, if not the same, ones for about $10 more, so when I saw these I immediately bought them. Used these for July 4th and they've been great! They aren't cheap, don't feel light, fabric is strong, print looks awesome, we couldn't have been happier!
customer_reviews.author: AR312

customer_reviews.title: Nope.
customer_reviews.text: One game and two bags were opening up. Had a family gathering the next day, so couldn't send them back so I just sewed them )and all of the others just in case) and kept them. Wouldn't recommend to anyone. It's a shame because the material is fine and the guts are fine, but the sewing is done so poorly. They could easily have a nice product here.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew B. Crawley

customer_reviews.title: Epic fail.
customer_reviews.text: Halfway through the first game a bag busted on the flat side. Weak material. Would have ruined the tailgate party if I didn't have duct tape.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn C.

customer_reviews.title: Murica
customer_reviews.text: Bags seem durable, we've played about 30 games with them and they've held up well. I would purchase again. MURICA!
customer_reviews.author: Matt S.

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I bought my fiance a customer corn hole set for Father's Day but didnt have the bags. He is a die-hard proud American so when i saw these, i knew i had to get them for him! They feel sturdy and durable for being thrown around all the time. Great quality for the price too! And the bag is great quality to carry them around in!
customer_reviews.author: IowaKay

customer_reviews.title: Looks good.  Time will tell.
customer_reviews.text: These bags seem like they should be as durable as previous ones we've gone through, but certainly not rugged. It was important to get bags with sand, as we've had rodents attracted to bags based on corn matter.
customer_reviews.author: M. Goldman

customer_reviews.title: Love these bags
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with the look and feel of these bags, and most importantly, how they land on the board. Previously, I bought the SC cornhole bags, but they are very large and do not slide on the board at all. They land big and hard and are difficult to play with. These bags have a good weight and slide much better than the others.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat them for the price !
customer_reviews.text: I have seen these type bags at the bigger retail sporting goods stores for almost double the price. They are very durable ( played on concrete and asphalt at least 20 games). If you strictly played elsewhere other than the driveway they would probably last a very long time. No complaints rips tears or holes so far, durable subtle material.
customer_reviews.author: Don Ing

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy and absolutely love
customer_reviews.text: These are of great quality. We play cornhole a lot. We wouldn’t recommend leaving them outside in the sun or out when it rains because this could ruin the quality. We have had our for awhile and would definitely by again when we need new ones. Exactly as described and well worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Jennaluv247

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bags
customer_reviews.text: Great bags, perfect for playing cornhole! Love that it's not made of corn or beans but little rocks so that mice can't get into them and they can accidentally be left out in the rain with no issue. They are also filled just right with not too much bounce or sliding.
customer_reviews.author: Knockiie

customer_reviews.title: Make sure u buy double stitch ones..
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately like others mine came apart in 1st game we played hope the really do guarantee these cause they are NOT sewn well. 2 of the 6 are useless.
customer_reviews.author: Midnight

customer_reviews.title: Quality fabric with lousy stitching
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is a thick duck cloth and seems like it will hold up. The stitching, however, leaves a lot to be desired. Standard cotton thread with loose seams means these are already coming apart after a few uses. I'm going to have to re-sew every bag with a stronger thread or they won't least one season! Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: gratehouser

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last 3 games
customer_reviews.text: A bag busted open on third game. Pretty disappointing on Memorial Day weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Matt K.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: These are great. Very sturdy canvas material. Love the Stars and Stripes pattern. My husband and I made some cornhole boards and these are perfect to go with it. They even came with a storage bag.
customer_reviews.author: T-Pain

customer_reviews.title: they survived a raccoon attack
customer_reviews.text: these are great weighted, high quality bags. I will have to say that they are very well made since the raccoons at the state park got ahold of them and they did not tear any of them! Definitely keeping them put up from now on!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Nice bean bags
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to go with my husband's military-theme corn hole game. Love the stars and stripes design! They're a good size and seem very well-made. We've only used them a few times so far, but they seem to be exactly what we were looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: Good bags
customer_reviews.text: Time will tell if they hold up to casual use.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Tournament ready
customer_reviews.text: These bean bags are just what we needed. The duckcloth covers should last for many seasons. Regulation size and weight in their own carry bag will announce that we are serious about this game.
customer_reviews.author: Retiree 68

customer_reviews.title: Throw great!
customer_reviews.text: we had crappy homemade bags with our new boards and they bounced like crazy! these are soft and nice and very durable so far and the best part is they don't bounce like crazy
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product with a great price
customer_reviews.text: These bags are really great and seem to hold up really well. We have another set that seems like they are made from thicker material but otherwise are the same in size and estimated weight. We got these to go with our Stars and Stripes boards that were received and it completes our set perfectly. So far they have not shown any signs of damage or wear.
customer_reviews.author: Audrey Crouse

customer_reviews.title: Great quality bags and comes with a good tote.
customer_reviews.text: These are perfect!! Went great with our marine Corps boards. The bags are very vibrant in color and great quality. These were a gift to my husband and he loves them. Highly recommend these!!
customer_reviews.author: kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: Material is quality. Weight is consistent. Caring bag is awesome. After a while of use there seems to be a little dust that comes out of them but they play well.
customer_reviews.author: Pete

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great service! Great product! Loving my purchase! Had an issue with one bag, but they replaced it very quickly!! Could not ask for better customer service!!
customer_reviews.author: Malsmama

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: These are good bags for this price point. Unfortunately one of my bags came with a tear in the seam, but sometimes things like this happens. I contacted the manufacturer online and received a response SEVEN MINUTES later; not an automated response either. They verified some basic info (copy of my receipt etc.) and a replacement was overnighted to me the next day. Their commitment to stepping up when something went wrong was superb.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy S. Johnson

customer_reviews.title: SO far so good!
customer_reviews.text: I needed bags made with the plastic pellets since we play a lot and at times they get left outside overnight by accident. They are GREAT, exactly what we were looking for. They feel like real corn, the product is durable, and we have been beating the heck out of them for about two weeks now, so far so good!
customer_reviews.author: jennifer l ribbe

customer_reviews.title: High quality, durable
customer_reviews.text: Haven’t used them yet, but I can’t imagine anything would be wrong with them. Very heavy duty cloth material, vibrant colors. They seem very high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon_Addict

customer_reviews.title: Nice price
customer_reviews.text: Used a few times and they seem to be holding up great
customer_reviews.author: Scott C.

customer_reviews.title: Great bags
customer_reviews.text: Fabric seems very durable, colors are bright, appear to be regulation size and weight. I am very happy with these bags and would buy this product again.
customer_reviews.author: CalifGuy

customer_reviews.title: Quality for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Found these on Wal-mart online store and they were 2 the price as these... Very happy with these and can't wait until the 4th to make fun memories..
customer_reviews.author: Robyn Wilson

customer_reviews.title: these are great. havent had any issues with ripping or coming ...
customer_reviews.text: built a cornhole set and needed bags. these are great. havent had any issues with ripping or coming apart after many hours of use.
customer_reviews.author: CHRISTOPHER SHERIDAN

customer_reviews.title: Must buy
customer_reviews.text: High quality, very good! Hours of fun! No residue no powder. Loved it
customer_reviews.author: Anthony C

customer_reviews.title: ... these bags to use for tailgating and was very disappointed. They made it through 2 games before the ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these bags to use for tailgating and was very disappointed. They made it through 2 games before the stitching on 3 of the bags started to come apart and the filler started coming out. I unfortunately missed the return window - so now I am stuck with these useless bags and will have to purchase new ones. Not a happy customer.....
customer_reviews.author: Stacey

customer_reviews.title: Needed extra bags
customer_reviews.text: We bought theses to go with what we already had so we could add more teams. The weight is perfect! They have been used about every other day since we bought them and they are holding up great maybe even better than my orginals
customer_reviews.author: Dive Heroes

customer_reviews.title: Great cornhole bags
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased these bags 3 times in the last 8 years. They are very durable! My neighbor and I play cornhole 3 to 4 nights a week on the sidewalk (cement). We expected the bags to wear down quick from hitting the cement, but they stood the test I definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: CAN2

customer_reviews.title: Ok for now and then
customer_reviews.text: they only lasted us 1 summer of use.. the filling material is good and bad, it breaks down and provides a nice powder to keep the boards slick but also affects the weight after a while. Also one bag ripped open after aprox 50 games. For the price tho I wasn't expecting too much.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Conyers

customer_reviews.title: Thick Quality material, not cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: Super fast shipping. Thick canvas-like material, not nylon. Good color, weighted well for cornhole. Love the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Cwills

customer_reviews.title: gift to go with corn hole
customer_reviews.text: We made corn hole games for Christmas I loved the bags cheaper than I could of made them. Was going to personalize them with initials but ran out of time just wrapped them up and gave as they were. Fast shipping and love the bag to hold the bags.
customer_reviews.author: Cassie

customer_reviews.title: if not better, as described in the ad
customer_reviews.text: This set of American Cornhole bags arrived on time and were exactly, if not better, as described in the ad. I love that the bags come with their own carrying bag. The bags are very sturdy and seem like they will last a long time if not left out in the weather. I would purchase this item again or another item from this company. I was very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley K.

customer_reviews.title: Tuff Corn Hole bags
customer_reviews.text: These bags feel like they will last awhile....best that we have had.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas W. Ingram

customer_reviews.title: Does the job!
customer_reviews.text: Love the patriotic theme of the bags. They throw well, the weight feels right and honestly, my only complaint is that the blue bags with the stars are leaving blue stains on our corn hole boards 😬😬 With that said, maybe it’s our boards? But the red & white stripe bags are not staining anything red, so I think it’s the cloth of the blue bags.
customer_reviews.author: JJnA

customer_reviews.title: These are good
customer_reviews.text: Played several games with these and they are fine. Definitely worth the money for new bags.
customer_reviews.author: Sammy Willoughby

customer_reviews.title: Worth the extra money
customer_reviews.text: Get these instead go wasting your money on the $10 bean bags. These were more expensive. But they are worth it!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Mary

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: These looked great and nice bag to put in. Was so excited. The very first time we used them one of the bags busted. Ran to a local Sports store to buy more. Was using with our Flag boards for my daughter's graduation party. They look nice but didn't hold up.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Feels very durable
customer_reviews.text: Very cute bag set. Only used a couple times so far but feel pretty solid and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: FLVarga

customer_reviews.title: Corn hole is the new "covid sport"
customer_reviews.text: These bean bags are colorful,correct weight,and as sturdy as anything repeatedly thrown on a wooden surface,over and over. Grandkids love them,and so do Mom and Dad. Many tournaments already played. Will buy more for Christmas gifts.
customer_reviews.author: MeeMa in Michigan

customer_reviews.title: Not Too Impressed After Months of Use
customer_reviews.text: Its has been a few months since I purchased this product. At first it looked pretty got but after a few times of use, some parts of the bags are starting to show signs of tear. It may look good initially but im starting to doubt the quality of the cloth used.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed.
customer_reviews.text: If you play cornhole, you know how important these are. So much better than the homemade ones I tried.
customer_reviews.author: CEW

customer_reviews.title: Measurements of bags received.
customer_reviews.text: They state: "REGULATION SIZE AND WEIGHT: Professional corn hole bags 6 inch x 6 inch 16 ounce each" They are fairly close to that statement: Red bags are all 15 7/8oz. Blue bags are 16 oz - 1 of them 16 1/4 oz - 2 of them 16 5/8 oz - 1 of them I found it interesting with the bags I received that the red and white bags were exact with every bag while the blue bags had up to 5/8 oz difference between the bags.
customer_reviews.author: Gandalf

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Like the go great with the board my husband made. Love the bag to carry/store them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Color is VERY deceiving.... not red!
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a cornhole set I built. When I bought "stars and stripes" I assumed I was buying blue bags with white stars And red and white striped bags.... welp I received coral (orange-ish) and white striped bags to go along with the blue / white stars. Not very patriotic which was the look I was going for. Very disappointed and I haven't even used them yet!! Over paid for what I wanted and I didn't even receive that...
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great weight and feel!!
customer_reviews.text: Got these as a replacement for my bag go set. I have to say the feel and weight are better than my original. Loved playing with these all summer. Will be buying again for friends and family!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Corn Hole Bags
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality bags, nice feel and weight! Carry bag is a Plus!
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Myers

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: The bags are high quality - heavy durable material and they come in a carrying bag to store. I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nisser

customer_reviews.title: Weight not precise.
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 sets. 6 bags under weight, 4 bags over weight, 6 bags right on. Awaiting response from manufacture for resolution. Update 1: manufacture says they allow a variance. Then they tell me that bags can be anywhere between 14-16 oz by regulation standards. That's fine but: 1: that doesn't explain the over weight bags. 2: current description and packing clearly state 16 oz. Update 2: manufacture currently working on replacements for improper weighted bags
customer_reviews.author: Devon Burton

customer_reviews.title: Just like photo well worth it in my eyes held up in a tournament
customer_reviews.text: Used these in a tournament was very impressed had no issues with them would buy again very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Violet

customer_reviews.title: Great bags and shipped quick!
customer_reviews.text: I’m a Army guy forward deployed in the Middle East and fell into some pre-made corn hole boards but no bags. I ordered these for me and the guys and they work great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Buy Needle and Thread when buying this.
customer_reviews.text: Product teared open after two games. Our cornhole boards were rough on the edges, so I don’t know if that’s to blame. I would’ve liked to think a very durable bag would not have teared but it seems other people have had a similar issue.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Crossley

customer_reviews.title: Dusty dusty dusty
customer_reviews.text: Bought the same exact set before. Last over 200 games and were great. This set is excessively dusty to the point it covers your boards. Not sure why the difference extremely disappointed with this purchase. QA/QC at the company level needs to be checked asap
customer_reviews.author: Mike Schriefer

customer_reviews.title: Shockingly good quality!
customer_reviews.text: I must say I was surprised at how nice these bags were, and I will buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Great bags!
customer_reviews.text: These work great, and the nice thing is if you leave them outside they don't explode like popcorn.
customer_reviews.author: Jaimee Roncone

customer_reviews.title: Good product.
customer_reviews.text: Good product. They were a hit at our 4th of july party.
customer_reviews.author: Cayla

customer_reviews.title: My second set of these Beanbags
customer_reviews.text: I built game boards for my family and used these Beanbags and they were a good choice.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky D. Russell

customer_reviews.title: cornhole bags
customer_reviews.text: Great buy! Right weight, size, and feel. The storage bag adds to purchase satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: Mark

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Our neighborhood has a cornhole competition so this was the perfect selection at a reasonable cost. Dick's sporting goods wanted $39.00 for the same thing. A definite cost savings and delivered right to my door!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Bags Split before finishing first Game.
customer_reviews.text: Very sad that the striped bags began to split before finishing the first game. Little plastic pellets spilled out of two of the four. It wasn't the seam that split, it was actually the fabric in the middle of the bag so not fixable. Hoping to get a replacement or money back.
customer_reviews.author: PL

customer_reviews.title: We ordered these 2 replace these bean bags and these are extremely sturdy and the bag is very nice
customer_reviews.text: We bought a corn hole set and left it in the basement of our lake house over the winter and the mice ate through the plastic bag and all of the beans inside the bag. We ordered these 2 replace these bean bags and these are extremely sturdy and the bag is very nice.
customer_reviews.author: Little Alum

customer_reviews.title: GAME CHANGER!!!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered these as replacement for the cheap powdery bags that came with our cheap boards. We have only had these a week or so, however, my game has improved exponentially! Good quality bags are more important than I realized. We love these!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shannon C. Holt

customer_reviews.title: Great bags
customer_reviews.text: These are durable bags! I have played hours of corn hole and these bags hold up great! I have had many people I play with ask me where to get these bags!
customer_reviews.author: Tyrone Brickey

customer_reviews.title: Corn Hole patriotic bean bags
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value, you couldn't make these for this price. They are holding up well. And having the tote bag included is a nice bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie

customer_reviews.title: Very nice set.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these and love them. They were a big hit at our 4th of July party.
customer_reviews.author: Evan Jones

customer_reviews.title: Love the patriotic flag design.
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for a flag-raising ceremony celebration on Independence Day. Everybody loved them.
customer_reviews.author: G. Lennon

customer_reviews.title: I like playing with my bags
customer_reviews.text: Ive gotten numerous compliments on these cornhole bags. They are great quality, and have held up great throughout our drunken bag toss. Store them inside and you won’t have problems with them. All bags with wear out eventually, and I will gladly purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Michael P.

customer_reviews.title: Not the most sturdy
customer_reviews.text: At first, these bags looked great. After only several uses, one of the bags ripped open by the seam. There was no indication that this would happen, i.e. loose strings. We were able to sew it up by hand, but I would expect these bags to be able to take a beating without the need for a repair.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Yep
customer_reviews.text: These are holding up really well. We used them all summer and they haven’t shown any sign of wear around the stitching as other reviewers mentioned.
customer_reviews.author: Milyzoul

customer_reviews.title: Decent Cornhole Bean Bags
customer_reviews.text: The weight and feel of the bag are great. The tote bag seems to be strong too and has decent draw strings. The bags surface was bright but quickly started to dull with use. After a couple of games the bags seem to produce a powder when they hit the cornhole boards after a throw, This powder may be a reason the fabric is dulling up a bit. Don't know why they are producing a significant amount of powder, but I hope it is dust in the mfg process and not the collision breakdown of the "Beans" within the bags.
customer_reviews.author: Trey Collier

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with this purchase. Love that they feel like corn filled bags without the worry of moisture.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well made
customer_reviews.text: Pleasantly surprised at how great these are! Sturdy fabric, well made, can't really tell it's not "real corn". Last set we had got left in the rain and it ended badly :-) Looking forward to using these for years to come!
customer_reviews.author: Christy Mack

customer_reviews.title: best dag gum cornhole player in my whole trailer park
customer_reviews.text: Man first off these bags are Awesome and I think they're lucky because every time I play cornhole I freakin Win. These bags have made me the best dag gum cornhole player in my whole trailer park. I gotta say man these things are Awesome.
customer_reviews.author: silverline03

customer_reviews.title: Perfection!
customer_reviews.text: Feel great..perfect weight..LOVE THEM...had to replace the ones that came with my set because my dog was stealing them and eating them! I won't let her near these gems!
customer_reviews.author: Suzanne Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if they are regulation weight because they feel a bit lighter than my other set but everyone agreed that these “felt better” I’ll order them again!
customer_reviews.author: Rerunsbuns

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy- excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised the quality was so good ..especially for the price. Comes with its own storage bag, super convenient. Quality is excellent..the size is bigger than I expected too
customer_reviews.author: Maria Benavides

customer_reviews.title: They're OK
customer_reviews.text: Some threads loosened on a couple of them during the first few games. Despite that, they seem made to last. During the first game, they were a bit rigid, but have since loosened up after a few more games. Seems they could use a bit more filling though.
customer_reviews.author: AJR

customer_reviews.title: Good looking and durable
customer_reviews.text: very nice bags. Love the color and general feel of the bags. Only disappointment is that you can't machine wash them. The red and white ones got dirty immediately. End of the day the seem to be very durable and look good. They don't need to be pure white to score points!
customer_reviews.author: James C

customer_reviews.title: Good for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Make sure your cornhole boards dont have sharp corners!! That will surely RIP them open !! I make my own boards and sand the edges, have not had a problem with these bags.most are gifts and I've had no problems
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Kinda bummed on purchase...
customer_reviews.text: Bought these as a Father’s Day gift for my boyfriend. Bags are in great shape, bright, good quality, BUT the bag is not what I expected! As you can see with the pic, the ties are already coming apart. Kinda bummed & disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie Larson

customer_reviews.title: Could be great but stitching was Poorly done.
customer_reviews.text: They feel great in your hand and are weighted right. The stitching was already loose when we opened the bag and after one day of playing with them they have started to fall apart at the seams. Contacting the maker for resolution. Edit: customer service for GoSports has not been helpful at all. Reached out multiple times and have not received a reply. Will be contacting amazon for resolution at this point.
customer_reviews.author: Quinn kearsley

customer_reviews.title: Great price! Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Terrific set! I was impressed with the quality. We've had a lot of fun with these
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Butler

customer_reviews.title: Not impressed for the price
customer_reviews.text: We used these one time...they seemed durable enough compared to other products on the market and I ordered these based on the reviews. Within one hour, a blue one busted apart at the seem, within the next two hours, two more blue ones busted, one again at the seem and the other one the side. Not impressed considering they were used for a only a day and now I have to sew them up.
customer_reviews.author: Stephany

customer_reviews.title: Perfect bag set
customer_reviews.text: Item came just as pictured. The bags seem very durable and are totally cute. The carry it nag is a great bonus for easy storage and carrying.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Good bags
customer_reviews.text: I got these to replace the ones that came with my cornhole game since they smelled like gas and were falling apart. These are MUCH better!
customer_reviews.author: Cato

customer_reviews.title: Bags are great quality feeling canvas and the stars and stripes print ...
customer_reviews.text: Bags are great quality feeling canvas and the stars and stripes print are consistent. Nice weight. Stitching looks complete and well done. Canvas storage bag is not cheap and definitely holds all of the bags no problem. Tried them out on our custom built corn hole boards as soon as we received them and they worked great. Well worth the buy, can't wait to use them at our wedding!
customer_reviews.author: Heather P.

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bags for the price. Haven't had them long, so don't know how long they'll last, but seem to last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Storage bag is noce and durable bags
customer_reviews.text: Had for a month now and in good condition . Good weight and sturdy fabric .comes with a bag with drawstring so that’s a plus
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie O’Reilly

customer_reviews.title: Work well.
customer_reviews.text: Forgot to order bags when my dad made us a cornhole set. These seem sturdy. Used them for a few practice rounds and we are happy.
customer_reviews.author: Krishna K

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality
customer_reviews.text: We haven't used the bags for an extremely long time, but they seem to be very high quality. The colors are vibrant.
customer_reviews.author: Knieber

customer_reviews.title: Great upgrade!
customer_reviews.text: If your looking for a better feeling bean bag, this one is worth the investment. Great feel with a touch of American spirit.
customer_reviews.author: Alexander Lopez

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE these bags
customer_reviews.text: Oh my goodness! I LOVE these bags. I made a beautiful oak game for a donation to a silent auction fundraiser and these bags finished it off perfectly and were loved by all! The bag is durable. The colors are great. The bags have tough fabric and great stitching. I may buy a set for myself now!
customer_reviews.author: khastings

product_meta.title: GoSports Premium All-Weather Duck Cloth Cornhole Bean Bag Set (Includes Tote Bag)
product_meta.description: This set of GoSports premium all-weather duck cloth official cornhole bean bags is a maximum value priced alternative compared to other overpriced sets that don't hold up to the demands of Cornhole gameplay. As you continue to toss this set of bean bags season after season you will have the satisfaction every buyer loves to feel - getting more than you paid for! That's because this premium duck cloth material comes professionally double stitched for tear-free gameplay and the weather-proof plastic filling keeps this set working even in the rain. Even diehard Cornhole players love the plastic filling that feels just like the original corn filling, but now without having to deal with mold, decay, and attracting critters! This long lasting value set even meets the regulation size and weight standards for Cornhole so you can use them in tailgating, camping, practice, competition, and just at home. As an added bonus, this GoSports Bean Bag Set comes with a convenient tote bag to carry and store your set until the next game. You won't find such a great bundle deal anywhere else!
feature_bullets: PREMIUM QUALITY: Official regulation corn hole toss replacement bean bags, double stitched for durability
ALL-WEATHER: 8 premium bean bags - 4 Red + 4 Blue and heavy duty tote bag for easy storage and transportation
DUCK CANVAS: Bean bags made from hardy and durable duck cloth with plastic pellet fill (ideal all-weather filling)
REGULATION SIZE AND WEIGHT: Professional cornhole bags 6" x 6" -16oz each
